scripts.build_mathjax: npm run --silent clone_mathjax; cd mathjax && npm install && npm run compile && npm run make-components
scripts.build_mathjax_for_debug: npm run --silent clone_mathjax; cd mathjax && npm install && npm install --save source-map-support && sed -i 's/module.exports = PACKAGE;/module.exports = function (name, js, libs, dir, dist) { const config = PACKAGE(name, js, libs, dir, dist); config["devtool"] = "inline-source-map"; return config };/' components/webpack.common.js && npm run compile && npm run make-components
scripts.build: [ ! -d mathjax ] && npm run build_mathjax; cd components/xypic && node ../../mathjax/components/bin/pack
